text: I still remember walking around this area and reading the sign that said "Warning: Dog Marriage". I read it quickly so I wasn't sure if that's what was truly written, so I decided to read the sign again and it said instead "Yes, you read that right". That's one of the early moments that made me realize I was about to play something special and that Toby Fox knew what he was doing, always keeping me off guard.
author: SupraDarky

text:
North: Ice
South: Ice
West: Ice
East: Snowdin Town ....(and ice)
author: Collin 255

text: This OST is truly one of the greatest ever composed.   8 tracks in and obvious amazing pieces like "Battle with a True Hero", Asgore's, and Megalovania aren't even uploaded.  The whole experience of this game will be remembered by many for a lifetime and I like to think the collective lives of all they come into contact with in the future will be made better for it.
author: xSayPleasex

text: Whenever my life is in a bad place, at the same time I miss supra videos. And then I have the catch up to do
author: Lucio Fernandes

text:
I respect undertale, but I don’t like it
It took the trope of the mass murdering “hero” to its logical extreme, and then lets you take it all the way back, all with great music and decent pixel art.
I don’t like the gameplay, and the deep lore is stupid to me, hence me not liking the game
The point is, that it’s Christmas and we are all around the campfire that is Christmas music, so let’s enjoy it while it lasts!
author: Brady Hagerman

text:
Those times when you wish you can forget your first playthrough and go through the game again. Undertale is one of those special gems where it really grips you along its crazy, wacky yet heartwarming adventure filled with love.... 

And Determination.
